name: Resume.io

name: Canva

name: Visual CV
description: This resume maker offers dual windows for editing. You can either create a new resume or upload/edit an existing one.

name: Resume.com
description: Its a free and one of the best platforms for resume building. It provides you three options for building your resume: 1. upload a resume, 2. Create from scratch, 3. Use a template.
